ProjectTitle: Unravelling European Governmental Venture Capital Funds: investment patterns, innovation and brain drain.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/04/2024
Sharing: to make data available for reuse it may be easier to to use a data repository e.g. KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), you can share data openly or apply access restrictions and only grant access upon request. In a data repository your dataset will get a persistent identifier (in RDR a DOI) that you can refer to in your publication, and your dataset is automatically registered in Lirias so it appears on your publication list. See also https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
